text: Taane i Gilgal tangada hai mee huaidu, dono ingoo go Sheba, tama ni Bikri, mai i di madawaawa Benjamin. Tangada deelaa ga ili di buu, ga wowolo gi nua, gaa hai, “David hagalee i tadau baahi! Gidaadou hudee daudalia a mee! Nia daane o Israel huogodoo, gidaadou gaa hula gi tadau hale!”20.1 1 Kings 12.16; 2 Kronikel 10.16
